name: Frog King (ducc)
description:
Frog King is a foddian like game where the objective is to get to the top of the map but be careful, creatures and magic may stand in your way if you're not quick enough. Can you reach the top and claim the crown of the frog king?

How to play WASD / Arrow keys - moves your character, Space for jump and S / Down for interacting.

12h+ of work for 10 days straight was put in by a solo dev called "ducc" to bring you Frog King.
